careers.title: Activtrak
careers.description: Lead high-risk, cross-functional Kubernetes and platform engineering initiatives.
accomplishments: Coordinated project to move 150 repositories from CircleCI to Github Actions using a centralized and abstracted YAML input for developer experience.
Wrote Github actions job viewer we could deploy at the org level since Github Enterprise has no such feature in Golang and React.
Wrote Kubernetes dashboard in Golang and React to view and troubleshoot all k8s objects 60x faster than using GCP console.

Designed self-service infrastructure provisioning platform leveraging Pulumi IaC and policy-as-code using GCP APIs, eliminating manual ticket-based provisioning workflows for 80% of cloud resource requests.

Instituted organization-wide SSL rotation, moving away from Thawte key management onto Google Managed SSL (networking.gke.io/v1 / ManagedCertificate), eliminating unplanned outages and fire drills due to credential expirations.
Led executive-level quarterly technical briefings synthesizing complex cloud platform KPIs and Apache DevLake into actionable workforce investment decisions for CFO and board-level discussions.

Architected, designed and deployed Github Slackbot interactive deployment notifications using Github Webhooks to update channels with real-time releases using Pub/sub, Firestore and GCP Cloud Serverless Functions.
Built extensible ETL framework supporting exports to S3, SCP, and Azure Blob Storage, credited with retaining strategic customers and preserving $5M in ARR.
Developed Packer-based automation to accelerate VM patch rollouts in GCP, reducing image provisioning time by 60% and tightening patch SLAs.
Migrated 150+ container repositories from GCR to Artifact Registry using automated Helm pipelines, maintaining 100% uptime during transition.
Optimized GKE cluster binpacking and vertical pod scaling, cutting $42K/year in compute waste while preserving service-level objectives.
Replaced legacy static VPN setup with HA Cloud VPN (BGP), enabling dynamic routing and full-mesh VPC connectivity across 11 GCP projects with zero cutover downtime.

Instituted cybersecurity protocols and standardized digital infrastructure to safeguard member information and uphold operational integrity in accordance with evolving nonprofit requirements.
Deployed a document workflow solution for legal and compliance documents using automated email notifications and audit trail tracking, integrating with organizational record systems.
Streamlined meeting coordination processes by implementing automated scheduling and archival solutions, ensuring robust recordkeeping and seamless collaboration among board members.

Participates in regular code reviews and offers suggestions for performance optimization.
Managed on-prem K8s cluster at Equinox using Kubespray and MetalLB for endpoints management.
Extended internal DevEx CLI to expose observability endpoints via self-service commands, reducing platform support requests and improving operational independence for N engineering teams.

Refactored Ansible deployment logic for multi-tenant telemetry ingestion, integrating with CI/CD to support zero-downtime updates across customer-facing observability pipelines.

Refactored monolithic Terraform codebase into modular components with isolated state and Atlantis-managed CI policies, improving deployment reliability and reducing configuration drift.
Stood up Nexus ECR for handling build artifacts (ruby gems, docker registry) to reduce effects of downtime from upstream artifact providers.
Participated in pair programming and mentored junior engineers to be world-class contributors in Python and Devops.
Developed high-fidelity Sensu checks integrated with telemetry pipelines, enabling alerting on latency, saturation, and error-rate anomalies across core services.
Migrated Jenkins workloads from EC2 fleet to ECS Fargate, reducing CI infrastructure costs and scaling throughput dynamically under variable job loads.
Expanded Chef test coverage with InSpec and Test Kitchen, enforcing policy compliance and improving audit reliability for deployment workflows.

careers.title: BoomTown

Managed and extended CI/CD workflows across TeamCity and Jenkins, enabling end-to-end pipeline visibility and gated delivery assurance using PowerShell.
Refactored monolithic legacy WordPress stack into Docker Compose-based modular containers using Python-Paver, gulp/yarn integrations, and layered PHP testing harnesses.

careers.title: Rackspace
careers.description: Cloud Integrations Team / Internal Tools Engineering. Supported internal billing, cloud identity systems, and Rackertools for the world's 2nd largest public cloud.
accomplishments: Migrated configuration management stack from Puppet2 to Puppet3 (PuppetDB + r10k + Hiera), enabling dynamic environment provisioning and policy-conformant module reuse.
Developed GitOps-based Ansible deployment workflows and firewall rule automation, introducing auditability, version control, and rollback for critical infrastructure ACLs.
Designed, implemented, and maintained CI tooling using Python SDKs for REST-driven deployment orchestration.
Created SDKs abstracting deployment APIs, enabling standardized self-service release operations for developers and platform teams.
Led production cutovers for high-risk identity/authentication infrastructure (multi-node authN clusters, schema-breaking migrations) with zero-impact delivery guarantees.
Delivered continuous delivery for mission-critical Ruby monolith across dev/stage/prod with integrated release gates and change rollback paths.
Coordinated with Rackspace Change Advisory Board for ITIL-style governance following ISO/IEC 20000-1 / 27005 to introduce risk categorization for each change.
Managed security risk with various frameworks including STRIDE (Threat Modeling), DREAD (Security Risk Scoring), NIST Risk Management Framework (RMF) improving security metrics.
Refactored Jenkins job architecture via Jenkins Job Builder, reducing MTTR from weeks to minutes.
